a.class: btn btn-sm o_wslides_gradient mr-1 mb-1 text-black
btn btn-sm o_wslides_gradient mr-1 mb-1 text-black

t.t-if: check_enroll_start_date == False and not channel.is_member and channel.enroll == 'public'

div.span: This course has not started enrollment yet!

t.t-elif: check_enroll_end_date == False and not channel.is_member and channel.enroll == 'public'

button.t-attf-class: btn d-md-none bg-white ms-1 border #{'alert' if channel.is_member else ''} #{'align-self-start' if channel.is_member or channel.enroll == 'invite' else 'align-self-end'}

div.class: col-md-4 col-sm-6 px-2 col-xs-12 d-flex flex-grow-1
col-md-4 col-sm-6 px-2 col-xs-12 d-flex flex-grow-1

div.div: You need to join this course to access "".

a.class: o_wslides_js_channel_tag_add border badge text-bg-light fw-normal py-1 m-1 o_not_editable

div.div: You need to join this course to access "".

a.class: o_wslides_js_channel_tag_add border badge text-bg-light fw-normal py-1 m-1 o_not_editable

template.name: Slide template for a training channel

li.t-attf-class: o_wslides_slides_list_slide o_wslides_js_list_item bg-white-50 border-top-0 d-flex align-items-center pl-2 #{'py-1 pr-2' if not channel.can_upload else ''}

template.name: Course template for a training path

li.class: o_wslides_slides_list_slide o_wslides_js_list_item bg-white-50 border-top-0 d-flex align-items-center pl-2 py-1 pr-2 o_course_extended

span.class: badge badge-danger font-weight-normal px-2 py-1 m-1

div.class: pt-2 pb-2 ms-2 me-2 ps-2 border-start d-flex flex-row align-items-center o_wslides_slides_list_slide_controls

span.t-attf-class: o_wslides_js_slide_like_down_mx ms-3 #{'disabled' if not slide.channel_id.can_vote else ''}

t.t-value: not disable_composer and not (request.session.uid and env.user._is_public())

div.class: o_wslides_js_course_timer flex-grow-1 flex-sm-0 align-items-center btn-group mr-3

xpath.attribute: o_wslides_nav_button btn btn-light border #{'disabled' if (not channel_progress[slide.id].get('completed') and is_sequential) else ''} #{'disabled' if not next_slide else ''}

t.t-value: not slide.channel_id.is_timer and slide.channel_id.is_sequential and not slide.question_ids and not channel_progress[slide.id].get('completed') and slide.channel_id.is_member

a.t-attf-class: o_wslides_nav_button o_btn_wslides_set_done btn btn-primary border text-white #{'d-none' if not allow_done_btn else ''}

div.t-if: slide.slide_category == 'scorm' and slide.is_tincan and not slide.channel_id.is_timer and slide.channel_id.is_sequential
div.span: You need to attempt current content to the end to mark it as done!

button.attribute: 1 if (is_sequential or is_timer or slide.slide_category == 'quiz' or slide.question_ids) else 0

div.t-att-class: 'o_wslides_lesson_aside_list_link d-flex p-1 %s%s' % (('bg-100 active' if aside_slide == slide else ''), 'text-muted' if not can_access else '')

a.t-attf-class: d-flex text-decoration-none mw-100 overflow-hidden ms-2 #{'text-muted' if not can_access else ''}
